H0.text: Communist forces in Vietnam began an offensive during what holiday in 1968. Chinese New Year

H1.text: Communist forces in Vietnam began an offensive during what holiday in 1968. Easter

H2.text: Communist forces in Vietnam began an offensive during what holiday in 1968. Diwali

H3.text: Communist forces in Vietnam began an offensive during what holiday in 1968. Tet

A4.text: The offensive was launched on the Tet holiday, a period chosen because most ARVN personnel were on leave.

A5.text: The name Tet Offensive is the truncated version of the Vietnamese Lunar New Year festival Tết Nguyên Đán.
